card.name: CW - Specific Response Types from Agents

data.text:
@lungisaximbi @stefanbar 

As discussed, When the upliftment agent clicks on images on a query that has been acknowledged, with the intent to upload images to the query, I propose that a tickbox or dropdown selection titled: "Were the requested images available at court?" with the option Yes or No. If the user (UA) selects yes, then allow them to upload images as per normal. If they select No, they will need to select a reason as per below and then still have the option to upload images as they need to supply a court stamped form stating the reason for the images not being available.

These reasons would then need to be kept for reporting purposes.

Any other questions, let me know.
